title: Responsive E-commerce Website
shortDescription: A responsive e-commerce platform designed for a curated collection of timepieces, featuring dynamic product catalogs and efficient multi-step checkout.

modalData.description: Developed "Demure Montres," an e-commerce platform for timepieces, focusing on seamless customer journeys from dynamic catalogs to efficient checkout. Implemented a robust user management system with role-based dashboards for administrators, sellers, and buyers, optimizing user experience and operational flow. Built with Vue.js and Tailwind CSS, this project showcases responsive UI, fluid transitions, dynamic stock updates, and simulated backend interactions for order processing, applying practical skills in web solution architecture and data flow management.
modalData.features:
• Dynamic landing page with hero section, product categories, and handpicked favorites.
  • Responsive product grid with high-quality visuals and quick "Add to Cart" functionality.
  • Intuitive shopping cart with quantity adjustments and clear checkout path.
  • Streamlined seller dashboard for managing listings and monitoring sales, including inline stock updates.

shortDescription: A native mobile application for iOS and Android that helps users track their fitness goals.

modalData.description: A native mobile application for iOS and Android that helps users track their fitness goals. The app provides a seamless user experience, motivating users to stay active through personalized plans and interactive features.
modalData.features:
• Personalized goal setting and tracking
  • Integration with Apple Health and Google Fit
  • Gamified challenges to encourage consistency
  • Progress analytics and visual reports

shortDescription: A Python-based tool for analyzing large datasets and generating insightful reports. Utilizes Pandas and Matplotlib.

modalData.description: A Python-based tool for analyzing large datasets and generating insightful reports. Utilizes Pandas for data manipulation and Matplotlib/Seaborn for creating compelling visualizations, enabling data-driven decision-making.
modalData.features:
• Automated data ingestion from multiple sources (CSV, SQL)
  • Advanced data cleaning and preprocessing pipelines
  • Interactive visualizations and dashboards
  • Export functionality for reports (PDF, Excel)

shortDescription: An experimental project exploring WebAssembly for browser-based image processing.

modalData.description: An experimental project exploring WebAssembly for browser-based image processing. This tool demonstrates how Rust can be compiled to WASM to perform computationally intensive tasks directly in the browser at high speed.
modalData.features:
• High-performance, in-browser image filtering (grayscale, sepia, invert)
  • Leverages WebAssembly for near-native processing speed
  • Real-time previews and adjustments
  • Minimal JavaScript footprint for core functionality
